mapper.insert: insert into rangSpfChange(id,matchId , rangwin , rangequals , rangfail ,publishtime , rangwinfx , rangequalsfx ,rangfailfx ,rangscore,createTime ) values ( #{id},#{matchId},#{rangwin},#{rangequals},#{rangfail},#{publishtime},#{rangwinfx},#{rangequalsfx},#{rangfailfx},#{rangscore},#{createTime});
